title: Internal attachments can be exported via "Export as .zip" feature
content:
Hello HackerOne Team
This newly disclosed report: #182358 Partial disclosure of report activity through new "Export as .zip" feature was not completely fix.
I have found that i can still view the attachment after it is being removed on the thread.
Best PoC is this #182358 since this is the newly fix and disclosed.
Steps to reproduce
Go to https://hackerone.com/reports/182358
Export the report as .zip
Now extract the .zip file (HackerOne_Report-security#182358.zip)
You will see that the image is still there, but base on the thread, you guys removed it on disclosed report.
I have attached the .zip file downloaded and save on my local and i can still view the removed image.
Disclosed partially removed attachment: {F138022}
Regards
Japz
steps: View the image that was supposedly removed from the thread
vuln_description: The vulnerability allows viewing attachments that were removed from a HackerOne report thread by exporting the report as a .zip file. The exported .zip file still contains the removed attachments, leading to unintended information disclosure.
reason: The vulnerability involves a straightforward process of exporting and extracting a report. There are no complex interactions or states involved, and the issue is easily reproducible once the feature is known.
